question: In which phase of clinical trials was sutezolid in 2018?
ideal_answer: By 2018 sutezolid had been evaluated in phase II clinical trials.

snippets.text: After decades of quiescence in the development of antituberculosis medications, bedaquiline and delamanid have been conditionally approved for the treatment of drug-resistant tuberculosis, while several other novel compounds (AZD5847, PA-824, SQ109 and sutezolid) have been evaluated in phase II clinical trials.
